content: around 24 single_crochet turn ​ round 6 chain 1 * 4 single_crochet in the next chain space skip 1 st 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in the next chain space skip 1 st 4 single_crochet in ​ the next chain space skip 1 st 2 single_crochet in the next chain space skip 1 st * around fasten_off and weave in the ends coaster trio - canoe mtn designs - 3 instructions coaster #3 ​ ​ round 1 chain 6 join to form a ring chain 2 12 double_crochet in the ring 12 sts ​ ​ round 2 chain 2 2dctog in the same st as the chain 2 chain 1 * 3dctog in the next st chain 1 * around 12 ​ ​ dctog 12 - chain 1 space turn row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in the next chain space chain 3 skip 1 st * single_crochet in the next chain space chain 3 skip 1 st * around 12 sts ​ ​ 12 - chain 3 sps turn photos below round 4 chain 1 single_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the first chain space skip 1 st * single_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the ​ next chain space skip 1 st * around round 5 slip_stitch into the next 2 sts chain 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in this st middle st of the next 3 double_crochet chain 1 skip 4 sts ​ 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 skip 4 sts 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in the next st first corner made chain 1 skip 4 sts * double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in the next st chain 1 skip 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 skip 4 sts 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in the next st chain 1 skip 4 sts * around coaster trio - canoe mtn designs - 4 round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in the first st and next 2 sts single_crochet in the chain space single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet in the chain space 2 ​ single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in the chain 3 space single_crochet in the next 3 sts * single_crochet in the chain space single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet in the chain space single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet in the chain space 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in the chain 3 space single_crochet in the next 3 sts * around single_crochet in the chain space single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet in the last chain space fasten_off and weave in the ends coaster trio -
